selected_quotes: The #AS PK study contributing to infliximab biosimliar approval, marketed this week in Europe

citation.abstract: To compare the pharmacokinetics (PK), safety and efficacy of innovator infliximab (INX) and CT-P13, a biosimilar to INX, in patients with active ankylosing spondylitis (AS).
citation.publisher: BMJ Publishing Group Ltd and European League Against Rheumatism
citation.title: A randomised, double-blind, multicentre, parallel-group, prospective study comparing the pharmacokinetics, safety, and efficacy of CT-P13 and innovator infliximab in patients with ankylosing spondylitis: the PLANETAS study

news.title: Biosimilar of Remicade Works in Ankylosing Spondylitis
news.summary: Action Points CT-P13, a biosimilar of infliximab (Remicade), demonstrated comparable and durable efficacy in the treatment of ankylosing spondylitis.
